# tintColor

**Interface Property**

The CSS color that MapKit JS uses for the user interface controls on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
tintColor?: string;
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapConstructorOptions/tintColor] to color the outline of the controls, text, and glyphs. Use any valid [https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-3/].

## Controlling the visible portion of the map

- **visibleMapRect**: The visible area of the map, in map units.
- **region**: The area the map is displaying.
- **center**: The map coordinate at the center of the map view.
- **rotation**: The map’s rotation, in degrees.
